news.title: Tesla shares tumble after Trump says DOGE should look at Elon Musk's subsidies
news.summary: Musk has criticized the tax and spending bill the president is pushing. Musk supported Trump's campaign and also served as an adviser to the White House.

news.title: Senate sets new record for longest vote-a-rama as Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' teeters
news.summary: Senators worked through the night on amendments to President Donald Trump's "big, beautiful" spending bill. A final vote could come Tuesday.

news.title: Online shopping see biggest slowdown in over decade as tariffs disrupt e-commerce: Survey
news.summary: Online shopping sector faces most disruptive period in over a decade as a result of President Trump's global trade war, according to an AlixPartners survey.

news.title: Watch Fed chief Jerome Powell speak at an ECB panel in Portugal
news.summary: The stream is slated to start at 9:30 a.m. ET. The event will be streamed live on CNN.com and the CNN iReport app.

news.title: Elon Musk's xAI raises $10 billion in debt and equity as it steps up challenge to OpenAI
news.summary: xAI will use the money to build out its AI infrastructure and develop its Grok chatbot. The funding will go towards xAI's efforts to build a chatbot and AI infrastructure.

news.title: Is the stock market open on the Fourth of July — and will it close early on July 3? What about FedEx, UPS and mail delivery?
news.summary: Independence Day comes with many closures — although it may be a good time to hit the stores. There are many stores that will be closed for the holiday.

news.title: Why out-of-favor Apple holds the key to tech stocks in the coming weeks
news.summary: Mark Newton, head of technical strategy at Fundstrat, says Apple shares could be ready to finally shine and drive a bigger tech rally.

news.title: Tesla’s stock falls as the Musk-Trump cease-fire is broken. What happened in Round 1.
news.summary: Musk and Trump have  broken out again, placing Tesla shares in the spotlight. Disagreement between Musk and Trump has broken out once again. Tesla shares are up more than 10 per cent.

news.title: Gold’s momentum is fading — and a pullback is coming, says HSBC analyst
news.summary: . Surprisingly, the Israeli-Iran crisis did not propel gold prices higher. It did not push the dollar higher, however, as the dollar fell against the yen.

news.title: I’m a stay-at-home mom. Do I take a part-time job to spend more time with my kids — or get a job for six figures?
news.summary: “So much of my head has been filled with thoughts of needing to be the best, the brightest, the wealthiest,” he says.
